name: Fashion Portfolio - coffee table book
description:
A coffee table book featuring the top 45 Cypriots of the fashion industry. In this bilingual edition you will read about the featured designers and makers of the Cypriot fashion industry, accompanied by high quality photographs by Harris Kyprianou. 

Fashion Portfolio features designers who persist to evolve and keep the bar high. People who tread in their time and envision, criticize, hope, and have turned their gaze to the future.

Part of the proceeds will be given to charity club 'Halcyon'.

Featured designers:
Afroditi Hadjieracleous, Alexia Kirmitsi, Andreas Zannetides, Androniki Yeratziotou, Anna Apostolou, Anna Koumoushi, Antonia Chambi, Constantinos Vasiliades, Dimos Natar - Andreas Georgiou,  Efi Papaioannou, Elena Strongyliotou, Eleni Gircalli, Eleonora Antoniadou, Eliana Antoniadou, Emmanuella Kouyoumdjian,  Erotokritos Antoniades, Fani Xenophontos, Fotini Lamnisos, Gregory Morfi, Grigoris Englezos, Harris Kyprianou, Ivi Kyratzi, Loukia Kyriakou, Marcia Thrasyvoulou, Maria Aristidou, Marina Nicolaidou, Marina Sophocleous, Marios Gregoriades, Marlen Andreou, Menelaos Theodosiades, Michalis Stylianoudes, Natalie Constantinidou, Nicole Tsiailis, Notis Panayiotou, Pantelis Panteli, Phanis Hadjianastasiou, Ramona Filip, Rita Attala, Ruth Erotokritou, Sandy Antoniou, Skevi Afantiti, Sofia Alexandrou, Stalo Theodorou, Tota Patsalidou, Xenia Giorgalli.

ISBN 978-9963-2944-3-5
a bookworm publication

Languages: Greek and English
Pages: 143
Dimensions: 23 x 33.5 cm

name: Flertaro hoop earrings
description:
Wear these impressive and very light suede earrings and you will definitely be the most beautiful of them all! Each piece of suede is handcut and one is placed next to the other to create a very stunning design. Choose the colour you most like and simply fall in love! 

Please note that the hooks are silver!

'Flertaro' means 'I flirt' in Greek.

Please note that the hooks are silver!

'Goustaro' means 'I like' in Greek.

name: 'Anama Vintage Collection
description:
Includes 1 x 'Anama Vintage 2007 500ml, 1 x 'Anama Vintage 2008 500ml, 1 x 'Anama Vintage 2009 500ml & 1 x 'Anama Vintage 2010 500ml, in a wooden box hand-made from recycled palettes & various vintage components

A naturally sweet wine made of sun dried grapes.

A total composition of 1.881 numbered bottles. 
A unique blend of oenological knowledge & creative xpressions, inspired by the balance between wine and design.

Anama is a contemporary wine concept based on the foundations of Cypriot tradition in winemaking.

Having aged 2 years in the oak barrels, to the sound of music composed by Conductor Yiannis Hadjiloizou. Anama can be enjoyed at present or aged for over 40 years.

name: Zenboard combo - Deck & Roller
description:
The first in the Zen collection, the Zenboards Deck was designed with lots of love and is handcrafted and hand decorated. The deck features a straight platform making this ideal for beginners and smooth rails making it easy to pull of spin tricks for the ones looking to go freestyle. The top comes with "grippy" surface, friendly on barefoot and durable to last forever.

Zenboard roller is strong and carefully shaped, its beautiful and a lot lighter than it looks!

Custom designs are available at an extra cost. 
Please contact us for specifics.

Free pick-up in Nicosia. You will be refunded the 8 Euros on pick-up.

name: Zenboard Deck
description:
The first in the Zen collection, the Zenboards Deck was designed with lots of love and is handcrafted and hand decorated. The deck features a straight platform making this ideal for beginners and smooth rails making it easy to pull of spin tricks for the ones looking to go freestyle. The top comes with "grippy" surface, friendly on barefoot and durable to last forever.

name: ZENBOARDS 100% NATURAL ORGANIC SURF WAX
description:
Handcrafted in the EU Zenboards 100% Natural Organic Surf wax is one of the few surf waxes out there that care about the environment.

Zenboards Organic Surf wax has its sole purpose to protect the environment without compromising performance. Made out of 100% natural materials like beeswax and widely tested from Indo till the cold water of South Africa you are guaranteed to stick to your board.

Currently available in Tropical and Cool/Cold.

Tropical (Red, Pink, Orange, White, Purple)
Cool Cold (Tri-colore, Blue, Green)

**Price includes shipping**

name: Anama 2010 Vintage wine 250ml
description:
A naturally sweet wine made of sundried grapes.

A total composition of 1.881 numbered bottles.
A unique blend of oenological knowledge & creative xpressions, inspired by the balance between wine and design. 

Anama is a contemporary wine concept based on the foundations of Cypriot tradition in winemaking.

Having aged 2 years in the oak barrels, to the sound of music composed by Conductor Yiannis Hadjiloizou. Anama can be enjoyed at present or aged for over 40 years.

250ml

Also available in 500ml.

Please contact us for wholesale inquiries.

name: A Bouquet Toss For You
description:
You’re dressed up to the nines, ready to hit the town. You have the perfect shoes/dress/hairdo, but something’s missing. Could it be that you need to slip on a statement necklace by Love From Cyprus? Yes, that’s it! You need one of Androniki’s nature and geometry-influenced creations. The attention-grabbing jewellery will perfectly complement any attire and provide that all-important je ne sais quoi.

Beautiful Plexiglas floral pieces by Cypriot Textile designer Androniki.

Dimensions: 18cm (width) X 11cm (high)
Material: Plexiglass

Turnover time is 5-7 days

name: Shiny Sun Ring
description:
You’re dressed up to the nines, ready to hit the town. You have the perfect shoes/dress/hairdo, but something’s missing. Could it be that you need to slip on a statement ring from Love From Cyprus? Yes, that’s it! You need one of Anna Koumoushi’s beautifully realised creations. The attention-grabbing jewellery will perfectly complement any attire and provide that all-important je ne sais quoi.

Let the sun kiss your hand and adorn it with Anna Koumoushi's leather hand crafted Run rings.

Comes in a large variety of colours, matching earrings, bracelets and necklaces are available.

name: SunEmbrace Bracelet
description:
SunEmbrace leather bracelets are handcrafted by local designer Anna Koumoushi. 

The SS'13 collection features matching rings, earrings and necklaces to complete the look.
